sentences.en: All memory of his boyhood has faded from his mind.
sentences.cn: 他已经记不清自己童年时代的情景.

sentences.en: Babbitt was most exasperated when she revealed his boyhood to the children.
sentences.cn: 她在孩子们面前揭巴比特小时候的老底时使他非常难堪.

sentences.en: He remembered that rat from his boyhood.
sentences.cn: 他自小就把那只老鼠铭记在心.

sentences.en: He wrote too of his boyhood, each successive volume rosier and weaker than the previous one.
sentences.cn: 他也写自己的少年时代, 一部比一部写得光明,但终究笔力日衰.

sentences.en: His boyhood had been saturated with Ruskin.
sentences.cn: 童年时他就阅读了罗斯金的大量作品.

sentences.en: How did you spend your boyhood?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样度过少年时代的?

sentences.en: I spent my boyhood in Harbin.
sentences.cn: 我的童年是在哈尔滨度过的.

sentences.en: In his autobiographical poem'The Prelude ', Wordsworth describes his boyhood in the Lakes.
sentences.cn: 在他的自传体诗《序曲》中,华茲华斯描述了自己在英格兰北部湖区的童年生活.

sentences.en: My boyhood hero was Bobby Charlton.
sentences.cn: 我童年时代的偶像是博比·查尔顿。

sentences.en: Standing here this morning, I recall my boyhood.
sentences.cn: 今天上午在这里站着, 我想起了我的童年.

sentences.en: The accordion music reminds me of my boyhood.
sentences.cn: 这手风琴的乐声让我回忆起了我的少年时代.

sentences.en: The book evoked memories of his boyhood.
sentences.cn: 此书唤起了他对童年的回忆.

sentences.en: The events of his boyhood are shown in a flashback.
sentences.cn: 他童年的故事是用倒叙法来表现的.

sentences.en: The scene woke memories of my boyhood.
sentences.cn: 这幕情景使我回忆起童年的往事.

sentences.en: They were failing lamentably to help their sons grow from boyhood to manhood.
sentences.cn: 他们抱憾未能帮助儿子们顺利地长大成人。

words.tran_cn: 男孩的；孩子气的；（女孩）像男孩的

trans.tran_cn: 男孩时代，少年时期，童年
trans.tran_en: the time of a man’s life when he is a boy
